head.title: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: The saxon:indent-spaces attribute

meta.name: title
meta.content: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: The saxon:indent-spaces attribute

body.p: When the output method is XML, HTML, or XHTML with indent="yes", the saxon:indent-spaces attribute may be used to control the amount of indentation. The value must be an integer. The default value in the absence of this attribute is 3.
